description:
Free42 is a re-implementation of the HP-42S Scientific Programmable
        Calculator and HP-82240 Printer. It is a complete rewrite, not using any
        HP code. It does not require an HP-42S ROM image. Even though it
        contains significant enhancements compared to the original calculator,
        Free42 remains fully compatible with the HP-42S, both in its user
        interface and in its ability to run programs written for the HP-42S.
author: Thomas Okken
